items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Address proof provided is valid as per document issued by London City Utilities.
Annual accounts available for years 2020, 2021, and 2022 with Ellipro scores.
Bank and postal details match organization data and are verified.
No pending directorship items explicitly mentioned in additional data.
Tax documentation pending verification; company highlights past contributions and commitments.
Regulatory compliance pending; company emphasizes adherence to legal requirements and partnership with the U.S. government.
Pending challenges include transitioning to greener economy and geopolitical risks; requires continued focus in business strategy.
No specific details on Politically Exposed Person (PEP) screening.
Missing specific breakdown of $162.4 billion managed revenue for 2023 and alignment with total net revenue of $158.1 billion.
Missing market capitalization data for years prior to 2021.
